name: Mad City Crime
description:
Deceive police, double-crossed the mafia, have fun, go for a drive on steep sport muscle cars, earn money at various works, promote your authority in the eyes of large mafias, that all depends on you!
Reload your weapon, hit the gas and hold on tight - it's the most colorful action in your life.

Mad City Crime open a new world, bringing to life the dark and seedy underworld of Mad City.
Features:

• Visually stunning updated graphics, character and vehicle models
• HD quality resolution
• Additional customization traffic frequency
• Countless hours of gameplay
• Third Person control
• Cool Classic cars & Sporctars
• Brilliant vehicle and drift physics
• Weather effects
